participant_1.background:
I am a night owl.
I am a dancer.
I love to sing.
I am a vegetarian.
I can play the piano.

participant_2.background:
I am allergic to shellfish.
I like horseback riding.
I work at a non profit that helps children.
My favorite food is cheese.

content.text: Hi there! I'm [name]. What's your name?
Hi [name], my name is [name].
It's nice to meet you, [name]. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to horseback ride, I work at a non-profit that helps children, and my favorite food is cheese.
That's great! I love to sing, I'm a vegetarian, and I can play the piano.
Wow, you're very talented! I'm not very musical myself, but I love listening to music.
Me too! I love all sorts of music, but I'm especially fond of classical music.
I've never really listened to classical music before, but I'd be willing to give it a try.
You should! There's so much beautiful music out there, and I'm sure you'd find something you like.
I'll keep that in mind. Thanks for the recommendation!
You're welcome! So, what do you like to do for work?
I work at a non-profit that helps children. I love my job because it allows me to make a difference in the lives of others.
That's really great! I'm sure you're making a big impact on the lives of the children you help.
I hope so! I really enjoy working with children and helping them reach their full potential.
That's wonderful. I'm sure you're a great role model for them.
I try my best! I want them to know that anything is possible if they work hard and set their minds to it.
I'm sure they appreciate that. You sound like a very caring and compassionate person.
Thank you! I try my best to be.
Well, it's been really nice talking to you, [name]. I hope we can talk again soon.
It was nice talking to you too, [name]. I hope so too.
